definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: " Indeed, " Geocentric Adventure" is in theaters Not quiet.
sentences.chinese: 确实，《地心历险记》的放映厅里很不安静。

sentences.english: That new detective show has been getting good reviews.
sentences.chinese: 那部新放映的侦探片受到了好评。

sentences.english: The famous film eventually made its way to our nabe.
sentences.chinese: 我闪社区最终放映了这部著名影片。

sentences.english: Works more than 40 year Chen Wenting in the Wenguang group is the movie projectionist .
sentences.chinese: 在文广集团工作40多年的陈文亭是电影放映员。

sentences.english: Traditionally, Chinese cartoons were only released on TV.
sentences.chinese: 传统上，中国的动画片只在中国放映。

sentences.english: That first movie began with a $70.5 million weekend.
sentences.chinese: 第一集放映时周末票房收入为7050万美元。

sentences.english: The movie was dumped on New Year's Eve.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片未经预映便于除夕夜直接放映了。

sentences.english: Mr. Yim said he hopes the Japanese government will allow the film to be shown there.
sentences.chinese: 严浩表示希望影片能获准在日本放映。

sentences.english: Mr. President? The fate of Jon Snow is about to be revealed in the screening room.
sentences.chinese: 总统先生？雪诺的命运将在放映室揭晓。

sentences.english: Movie theatres showed documentaries and heroic epics.
sentences.chinese: 电影院放映着战争纪录片和英雄们的史诗片。

sentences.english: Teenagers visit the cinema quite often, regardless of what is on.
sentences.chinese: 不管是什么电影在放映，青少年经常去电影院观影。

sentences.english: This movie theater often shows the latest cartoon films.
sentences.chinese: 这家电影院经常放映一些最新的卡通电影。

sentences.english: This is the fourth film that has been shown in our school this term.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们校本学期放映的第四部电影。

sentences.english: which is a really old-fashioned cinema, and they show alternative films.
sentences.chinese: 是一个老派的电影院，他们放映不同的电影。

sentences.english: This film is recommended by Du Haibin who will attend the post-screening discussion.
sentences.chinese: 此片由杜海滨推荐，而他将出席放映后谈论会。

definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
